title: Virginia open houses Sept. 28-29
text:
Here’s a list of open houses taking place Sept. 28-29 in Virginia. We’ve divided the list by counties. To learn more about the properties for sale, click on the link underneath the address, which will take you to the listing. As always, feel free to search a listing of properties for sale in the Washington region.

This list reflects the open houses entered into Bright MLS before Thursday afternoon.

Looking for the District? Click here. Looking for Maryland? Click here.
